Module Frogger
Package p4_group_8_repo.Controllers

Class ActorMovement

java.lang.Object
p4_group_8_repo.Controllers.ActorMovement
public class ActorMovement
extends java.lang.Object
The movement controls of Actor objects are written in this class. This class dictates how the objects should act when keys are pressed or released.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Actor actor
    Actor object for which movement is needed.
    private boolean changeScore
    Variable for score change as the user plays.
    private javafx.scene.image.Image imgA1
    Image object to set an image of the Actor.

    movement of the Actor object along the X axis
    private double movementY
    movement of the Actor object along the Y axis
    private int points
    points the user scores as the Actor object moves forward
    private boolean second
    To indicate if the Actor object is on the second half of animation

  • Method Details

    • movement

      public void movement()
      The main controls of the Actor object. Dictates how the object should act at a key press or key release.

    • actorKeyPress

      private void actorKeyPress()
      Sets the actions of the Actor object when keys are pressed.
      (actor.setOnKeyPressed)

    • actorKeyRelease

      private void actorKeyRelease()
      Sets the actions of the Actor object when keys are released.
      (actor.setOnKeyReleased)

    • keyAction

      private void keyAction​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      A series of events that occur when a set of keys are pressed or released.
      Parameters:

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Gets the points accumulated by the Actor object as it moves forward.
      Returns:
      points accumulated

    • changeScore

      public boolean changeScore()
      Gets the changeScore variable that indicates whether the score has changed or not.
      Returns:
      current state of the changeScore variable (true/false)
